reviewText: I love the history of the Hustler's Convention and The Last Poets. It's a must see if you really want to understand where rap music came from.
Had to get this. Back in 79 i would hear certain dj's play this. I eventually memorized the lyrics. To get the back ground now as a grown man is really a learning experience.
What  I was able to see on Starz one morning was awesome!!!! Disappointed that its not available to watch with my AP subscription. I had to catch it live stream with my Starz subscription.
